Author: EmilyVS
Text: It’s good to tell your boyfriend these things. It can help him be a better partner for you, if he takes it into consideration.

Author: button_eyed_coraline
Text: It’s good to be open and honest. I told my husband when I was still technically overweight. It didn’t stop me from losing more weight, it just helps him be aware of how to comment or not comment on my body.
